Athletic shorts made specifically for running and other intense workouts are known as men's running shorts. With features like moisture-wicking fabric and ventilation panels to keep the user cool and dry during activity, they often have a lightweight and breathable construction.

For increased comfort and support, most men's running shorts contain an inside lining or briefs. They also typically have an elastic waistband with a drawstring to provide a snug fit. Additionally, they frequently contain reflective accents for visibility whether running in the morning or at night.


Running shorts can contain pockets to hold basic necessities like keys or a phone and come in a range of lengths from short shorts to longer inseams. Compression elements may also be included in some garments to provide additional muscular support and lessen muscle fatigue during runs.
